meanings.definition: To speak or write at length or in detail.
meanings.sent1: She expatiates on her favorite books during book club meetings.
meanings.sent2: The professor expatiates on the importance of studying history.
meanings.sent3: He expatiates on the topic of gardening with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling expatiates like a river flowing endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The speaker expatiates on the mysteries of the universe, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: To wander freely or at leisure.

meanings.sent2: During the hike, we expatiate through the scenic forest trails.

meanings.definition: To enlarge in discourse or writing.
